Client.Name: Dongguan Feide Animation Model Co., Ltd

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Dongguan Feide Animation Model Co., Ltd., established in 2017, is located in Dongguan City, Guangdong Province. It is an enterprise mainly engaged in the manufacturing of cultural and educational, industrial and aesthetic, sports and entertainment products.

The company was formerly known as Dongguan Weige Animation Model Technology Co., Ltd. After years of development, we have become industry experts in the research and production of animation models, toys, electronic products, plastic and hardware products.

We are committed to combining the latest technology with anime art to provide high-quality and highly realistic anime peripheral products for anime enthusiasts worldwide.
